DOC.HEADLINE: NEWS , TIPS & BARGAINS ; ' WHEELCHAIR THROUGH EUROPE '
DOC.TEXT: Although she ' s been in a wheelchair most of her life , Annie Mackin has logged four trips to Europe since 1978 , and last summer she decided to write a guide for other disabled travelers , " Wheelchair Through Europe. " Mackin , 40 , wrote her book with a budget in mind , seeking_out accessible lodgings from $ 90 to $ 110 a night , double . European travel , she says " can be difficult , can be challenging , but it ' s not impossible . You miss a lot if you stay home. " To obtain a copy of her book , send check or money_order for $ 12.95 to Graphic Language Press , P.O. Box 270 , Cardiff by the Sea , Calif . 92007 .
